info.description:
WarningPipe
++++++++++++++

.. contents :: 

Summary
=======

A pipe to allow warning messages to be logged to a database and displayed as a flash message in the browser without raising an exception

Get Started
===========

* Download and install from source

Author
======

`James Gardner <http://jimmyg.org>`_


Changes
=======

0.1.0
-----

2010-09-16
~~~~~~~~~~

* First version

License
=======
WarningPipe - A pipe to allow warning messages to be logged to a database and displayed as a flash message in the browser without raising an exception

Download
========
